document.docAuthor: GIERLASIŃSKI, Grzegorz, TASZAKOWSKI, Artur & LIS, Barbara
document.masterDocTitle: Stilt bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Berytidae) of Poland: check-list, distribution, bionomics

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Stilt bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Berytidae) of Poland: check-list, distribution, bionomics

subSubSection.paragraph: R a n g e e l e m e n t: Caspian-Atlantic.
B io no mic s: Mesophilous/xerothermophilous; polyphagous (mainly Caryophyllaceae , Geraniaceae , Asteraceae , Scrophulariaceae and Poaceae); one generation a year.
R e m a r k s: Common and widely distributed in Poland .
Baltic Coast: Chłapowo [CF37] – Smreczyński 1954 ; Gdynia [CF44] – Lis B. & Kowalczyk 2017; Karpinka [ VV 88] – Schmidt 1928 ; *Smołdzino [XA46] – 1 Aug 2002 , 1 ex. , leg. B. & J. A. Lis (DBUO);
Białowieża Forest: Czerlonka [FD84] – Strawiński 1956b ; general [FD94] – Trojan et al. 1994 .

Eastern Beskidy Mts: Bednarka [EA20, EV29] – Taszakowski & Gorczyca 2018 ; *Bednarka, Cieklinka Mt. [EV29] – 6 Aug 2015 , 1 ex. , leg. R. Dobosz (USMB); Ciężkowice [DA91] – Smreczyński 1954 ; Libusza [EA10] – Taszakowski & Gorczyca 2018 ; Przemyśl, Lipowica [FA21] – Kotula 1890 ; Przemyśl, Wzniesienie [FA21] – Kotula 1890 ; Zarzecze [FA13] – Krasucki 1919 .

Eastern Sudetes Mts : *Gipsowa Góra Res. [ YR14 ] –
8 Sep 1932
,
4 exx., leg. H. Nowotny ( USMB )
.

Neides tipularius
– distribution in Poland.
